label: customsProcedureGuaranteeCode
comment: The code specifying an undertaking given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee to ensure that an obligation will be fulfilled for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The code specifying an undertaking given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee to ensure that an obligation will be fulfilled for this trade related tax, levy or duty.

rangeIncludes.comment: A character string used to represent a customs procedure guarantee.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of formal steps to satisfy a cross-border regulation, law or convention.
A trade related fiscal levy or duty.
